steps.name: Given  User creates POST request with valid endpoint and invalid request body
When  User sends HTTPS Request with endpoint from  given "CreateUserWithWrongFormatEmailId" and  "User"
Then  User receives "400" and "Bad request User email Id is required and should be in proper email format" for corresponding Post Negative Scenarios

parameters.name: Message
parameters.value: Bad request User email Id is required and should be in proper email format
